content: I couldn't find any documentation on the format of the ignoreWarnings.txt file. Adding the message suppressed the info message, but caused an error for a missing reason. How do I specify a reason?

copy the INFO or WARNING from qa.txt file and create a comment summarizing the issue

here is an example :

== Suppressed Messages ==
# This issue is discussed here FHIR-12956. These warnings are due to using the actual base the _id searchparameter expression instead of using "Resource".
WARNING: SearchParameter/us-core-documentreference-id: SearchParameter: The expression 'DocumentReference.id' is not compatible with the expression 'Resource.id' in the derivedFrom SearchParameter http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter

# Examples demonstrate use of additional Codes
INFORMATION: Observation/hunger-question-example: Observation.category[0]: This element does not match any known slice defined in the profile http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-observation-screening-response
Thanks! I added the file name to the Confluence page, so that a simple search on it will bring it up.
Vassil Peytchev has marked this topic as resolved.
I created a pull-request https://github.com/FHIR/sample-ig/pull/53 to include a pointer to that confluence page from the sample-ig.
